# Image Attribute Keys

**API Collection**

Image Types

## Constants

- **kCIAttributeTypeImage**: A [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIImage] object.
- **kCIAttributeTypeTransform**: The transform type of an attribute.

## Constants

- **Filter Attribute Keys**: Attributes for a filter and its parameters.
- **Data Type Attributes**: Numeric data types.
- **Vector Quantity Attributes**: Vector data types.
- **Color Attribute Keys**: Color types.
- **Filter Category Keys**: Categories of filters.
- **Options for Applying a Filter**: Options that control the application of a custom Core Image filter.
- **User Interface Control Options**: Sets of controls for various user scenarios.
- **User Interface Options**: Keys or values for the size of the input parameter controls for a filter view.
- **Filter Parameter Keys**: Keys for input parameters to filters.
- **RAW Image Options**: Options for creating a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIFilter-swift.class] object from RAW image data.
